item.title: Instant Ramen
item.author: rszumski@gmail.com (Russell Szumski)
item.description: Tools: R Data Source: 2682 Instant Ramen Noodle Ratings Created bi-grams to see how often word X is followed by word Y with names of instant ramen noodles to find any flavors and key attributes/phrases used in the names that are grouped together and appear most often. Also because why not, who hasnâ€™t enjoyed some instant ramen before. Used tidytext for the calculations and networkD3 for the visualization.
